title: How many times did CSK win in the IPL? - Quora

response.answer_text: CSK is one of the best IPL teams. It is one of the most successful teams of IPL. It has a huge die-hard fan base. It has the best record in IPL despite being suspended for two years. Let’s look at the record of most wins in IPL history till now.  CSK is at number 2. But look at the win %. It is better than all the other teams. CSK has played fewer matches because it was suspended for 2 years (2016 & 2017). Now look at the other records; 2008- Runners-up. 2009- Semifinalist. 2010- Winner. 2011- Winner. 2012- Runners-up. 2013- Runners-up. 2014- Playoffs. 2015- Runners-up. 2016- Suspended. 2017- Suspended. 2018- Winner. 2019- Runners-up. No other team has this kind of record. It is the only franchise that has qualified for playoffs every time. CSK is the most consistent team of IPL and because of that, it is the second richest franchise of IPL with a net worth of RS. 732 CR.  One of the main reasons for CSK success is MS Dhoni. His brilliant cricket brain has helped CSK a lot. There are a lot of matches where his captaincy has done wonders. CSK fans call him Thala. It is very strange and interesting how a boy from Ranchi has been accepted by the people of Chennai. . . Hope you like the answer. Follow my page for more sports updates. Thanks, Aman

Three Time Winner In 2010, 2011 & 2018 2010: Chennai Super Kings beat Mumbai indian by 22 runs at dy patil stadium 2011: Chennai Super Kings beat Royal Challengers Bangalore by 58 runs at MA Chidambaram Stadium 2018: Chennai Super Kings beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by 8 wickets at Wankhede Stadium Overall Record (from 2008 to 2018) 2008: Runner up 2009: Semifinal 2010: Winner 2011: Winner 2012: Runner up 2013: Runner up 2014: 3rd Place 2015: Runner up 2016: Suspend 2017: Suspend 2018: Winner 2019: Runner up
